articles.author: Tom Warren, Ash Parrish
articles.title: Microsoft announces more Xbox leadership changes as Activision's Bobby Kotick departs - The Verge
articles.description: With the news that Bobby Kotick’s last day is December 29th, Microsoft has put Activision Blizzard executives under content and studios president Matt Booty.
articles.content:

articles.title: Emergence of replication timing during early mammalian development - Nature.com
articles.description: Genome-wide replication timing maps of mouse embryos from the zygote to the blastocyst stage were generated using single-cell Repli-seq, shedding light on the establishment of the epigenome at the beginning of mammalian development.

articles.description: O Christmas tree, O Christmas tree, you stand in splendid beauty!
